pageSubTitle: SwitzerIT offers a complete range of IT services to support businesses and individuals in all their IT needs.
description: From simple troubleshooting to full infrastructure management, our team of experts puts its know-how at your service. Discover our main services below and contact us for any specific request.
service1Description: IT troubleshooting and support to efficiently resolve your issues, remotely or on site.
service1List1: Remote user support (workstations, software, email, network access)
service1List5: Diagnosis and resolution of hardware and software incidents
service1List6: Support for common tools (systems, applications, peripherals)
service2Description: Management and maintenance of your IT environment to ensure stability and continuity.
service2List1: Monitoring and supervision of infrastructures and services
service2List4: Asset tracking and environment health monitoring
service3Description: Implementation of tailored solutions to protect your data and reduce IT risks.
service3List1: Risk analysis and security posture assessment
service3List2: Compliance support (ISO 27001, TISAX, IT security best practices)
service3List6: Recommendations, remediation plans, and security control reinforcement
service4Description: Installation and optimization of reliable, secure wired and Wi-Fi networks tailored to your needs.
service4List1: Design and implementation of wired network architectures
service4List2: Installation and configuration of switches, routers, firewalls, and network equipment
service4List3: Deployment and optimization of professional Wi-Fi solutions (access points, controllers, coverage)
service4List6: Installation and configuration of video surveillance systems (cameras, recorders, access)
service4List7: Implementation of access control solutions (badges, codes, readers, rights management)
service4List8: Diagnosis and resolution of network issues
service5Description: Cloud and professional email solutions to enhance communication and collaboration.
service5List1: Migration and deployment of cloud solutions (Microsoft 365, Google Workspace)
service5List3: Collaborative tools for document sharing and teamwork
service5List5: Secure cloud storage and data synchronization
service6Description: Supply, installation, and integration of IT equipment adapted to your environment.
service6List1: Supply, installation, and maintenance of workstations, printers, and peripherals
service6List2: Installation and configuration of servers, patch panels, and network equipment
service6List3: Commissioning and integration of equipment into the existing environment
service6List5: Optimization and evolution of existing solutions
service7Description: Personalized support for your IT projects, whether simple or complex.
service7List1: Needs analysis and technical constraints assessment

ctades: This list is not exhaustive. SwitzerIT supports all your IT needs. Every company and individual has specific requirements. Our team takes the time to listen to your expectations to offer tailor-made solutions perfectly suited to your situation. Whether your project is simple or complex, standard or unique, we have the expertise to support you.
ctades2: Feel free to contact us to discuss your specific needs.
landingctatitle: ðŸ’¡ Do you have a specific need?
landingctades: This list is not exhaustive. SwitzerIT supports you with all your IT needs, whatever they may be. Feel free to contact us to discuss your project, even if it's not listed here. Our team of experts will find the right solution for your situation.
landingdes1: IT solutions designed to simplify your daily operations
landingdes2: Whether you're a business looking for a reliable IT partner or an individual needing technical support, SwitzerIT puts its expertise at your service. We address all your IT issues with professionalism and responsiveness.
